description.value:
Can directly interface with a machine or device. Poor: requires Willpower test to use, -10 to interact with machine spirits. Common: +10 to Tech-Use, Pilot, or Drive devices capable of MIU linking. Good: +10 to communicate with machine spirits, Tech-Use, Pilot, Drive, Logic, Inquiry, and Ballistic Skill. Can also experience senses of cyber familiars.

Effect: Rare / Initiated

Notes: 1750 T 15 R
description.summary: Can directly interface with a machine or device. Poor: requires Willpower test to use, -10 to interact with machine spirits. Common: +10 to Tech-Use, Pilot, or Drive devices capable of MIU linking. Go

Can also experience senses of cyber familiars.
